events.eventDescription: Mikhuvha iyi i a pfiwa nga dzinwe khamphani, tshitshavha, na dzinwe khumbelo dza lushaka.

hero.title: Sedzani Vhulasi Ha Vhathu Na Mikhuvha Ya Vhusiku
hero.subtitle: Sedzani masheleni ane a fhaṱiwa u itela khonani dza vho khou imela vhathu.
hero.supportSubtitle: Nga vhurereli ha mupo na vhaḽi vha lushaka na mivhuso.

footer.address: 143 Ndilani Ya Vhubvaḓuvha, Sandown, Sandton, Gauteng, Afrika Tshipembe

services.title: Zwi Ni Nga Ita Na Zwi Ni Nga Fhata Kha Tshitshavha
services.subtitle: U itela mushumo, mivhuso, na vhushaka.

steps.title: Tshiimiswa
steps.description: Phakha na vhathu vha lushaka lwannda, fhatani tshumelo dzavho, na vhaite tshiṱaluswa.

steps.title: Mikhuvha Ya Tshitshavha
steps.description: Ni songo kala mikhuvha ya tshitshavha.

steps.title: Mishumo Na Tshikovha
steps.description: NGOs dzashu dzi thusa nga vhutsila u bvela phanḓa, na mushumo wa dziandzhe.

steps.title: Tshimedza
steps.description: Vhathu vha u vhala forums na blogs vha tshi amba nḓila dza vhutshilo.

subscribe.title: Inwalani Mulayo Wasu Wa Nnḓu
subscribe.description: Fhatalani nga zwipfiwa, mishumo, na zwa dzinwe dzianda ṱhanuwa uri dzi fhiwa kha vhana na forums.

faq.title: Mibvunziso Ya Khanḓani
faq.subtitle: Arali ni si kona u wana phetho, fhatuwani kha vhurereli ha lushaka.

questions.question: Sisonke AI Tshiimiswa Tshifhinga Tshakhamusi?
questions.answer: Tshelede yanḓa iya nga tshikovha u itela lushaka lwa u takalela mushumo na phakha.

questions.question: Sisonke I Nyadza Mini Tshenetsho Tshiimiswa?
questions.answer: Tshiimiswa tshoṱhe tshikovha tshi fhedza lutshelo lwa tshanda zwino vhuḓimaho.

questions.question: Ni Khou Gana Na Tshitshavha I Tshini I Re Vhuḓi?
questions.answer: Ee, khamphani dzaḽiḽaho dzinwe dzakhumudzedzwa na tshikovha tshavho tshoṱhe tshitshi.

questions.question: Ni Mishumo I Phadzanaho Na Tshitshavha?
questions.answer: Ee, mishumo yeneyo yo fanelwa vha ṱhama.

questions.question: Ni Tshiimiswa Tshimange Vhuḓivhalea?
questions.answer: Ee, tshimange tshone tshitshimbila, tshoṱhe tshitshimbila tshi nga vha ṱhama.

blogs.title: Mikhuvha Ya U Fhumula Mushumo
blogs.subtitle: Dovhani u wana pfunzo dza zwa mivhuso na mushumo.

posts.title: Vhuleme Vhuḓi Ha Mushumo Na Ndivho
posts.description: U vha mulayayo vhane vha vha na vhana vhe vha khou lugiselela u bvela phanḓa. Tshikovha tshiḽa tshiḓḓela...

posts.title: Mikhuvha Ya U Takalela Vhana
posts.description: Vhana vha tshi vha na mvelele kha mushumo vha bvela phanḓa u itela mushumo. U bvela phanḓa ha vha hu tshi vha...

posts.title: Zwi Sa Fanela U Amba Nga Ha Mushumo
posts.description: A tshiḽa tshifhinga tsha mushumo tshoṱhe tshiṱuma tshifhinga tshivhuya tshi tsinyiswa...
